Title: Usavich II
Description: ['The adventures of Putin and Kirenenko, two rabbits stuck in a Russian prison, continue as they make their escape and try to avoid the fearsome Soviet bunnies on their trail! ']
Staff: [['Tomioka, Satoshi', 'Director, Script, Storyboard, Screenplay, Original Creator'], ['Bach, Johann Sebastian', 'Music'], ['Ueno, Hironori', 'Sound Effects, Music']]
